name: suffolk
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a county (= area with its own local government) in eastern England: He lives on the family farm in Elveden, in Suffolk.
More examplesFewer examplesHe had a country house in Suffolk.The village of Peasenhall, in Suffolk, is just off the A12, between Ipswich and Lowestoft.The new players include Jamie Moul, 19, from Suffolk.Southwold is about 100 miles northeast of London on the Suffolk coast.
